newsitem.title: USA: CenterPoint files $200 mln shelf debt/equity.
newsitem.headline: CenterPoint files $200 mln shelf debt/equity.

text.p: CenterPoint Properties Corp said Thursday it filed a shelf registration with the Securities and Exchange Commission for up to $200 million in debt securities, prefererd and common stock and warrants.
When combined with a previous registration, the Chicago-based real estate investment trust said it will have up to $315.5 million of those securities available for sale.
CenterPoint said it will use net proceeds for general business purposes, including the development, redevelopment and acquisition of additional properties and repayment of outstanding debt.
No underwriters were listed in the filing.
